short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight a FASTA sequence and quickly BLAST for primers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wish you could highlight a nucleotide sequence or Refseq and send it to Primer-BLAST? Now you can! Simply select the sequence you want, right-click, and BLAST!
